abstract: Transportation Safety Board of Canada is investigating incident in which Air Canada jet suddenly plummeted during severe turbulence, injuring 21 passengers.
lead_paragraph: Passengers on a flight from Shanghai to Toronto on Wednesday were thrown from their seats, some hitting the ceiling, as the plane suddenly plummeted. It then made an emergency landing in Calgary.

headline.main: 21 Injured on Air Canada Flight After Sudden Turbulence
headline.print_headline: Canadian Jet Drops Fast in Turbulence; 21 Are Injured

snippet: Passengers on a flight from Shanghai to Toronto on Wednesday were thrown from their seats, some hitting the ceiling, as the plane suddenly plummeted. It then made an emergency landing in Calgary.
